plot: Join Larry and the artists from Big Idea to learn how to draw Bob the Tomato, Junior Asparagus and more than 10 other favorite VeggieTales characters in this fun-filled, 90-minute show. ...
title: VeggieTales: Bob & Larry's How to Draw!
plot_es: Join Larry and the artists from Big Idea to learn how to draw Bob the Tomato, Junior Asparagus and more than 10 other favorite VeggieTales characters in this fun-filled, 90-minute show. ...
